text: arau te'omra sampradayara lokasakala te'omra ocarata udabhraanta hai guci ahila arau agara paraa'i sihamta asatkarmata lipta achila. Te'om ka’le, ‘he mora sampradaya! Ihamta mora kan'ya, tomalokara babe ihamtehe bechi paraitra. Gatike tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau mora atithi sambandhe moka lajjita nakaraiba. Tomalokara majata ejano sadhu byakti na'ine’
